text.autoconfig.unforgivingvoid.title: Unforgiving Void Config
text.autoconfig.unforgivingvoid.option.t: The distance below world bottom which Unforgiving Void should send the player to the target dimension at.
text.autoconfig.unforgivingvoid.option.d: Drop obsidian for the player when they appear in the Nether.
text.autoconfig.unforgivingvoid.option.f: How many seconds the player should get
fire resistance for when they appear in the Nether.
text.autoconfig.unforgivingvoid.option.h: Put the player approximately this far away horizontally from where they fell.
text.autoconfig.unforgivingvoid.option.d: This specifies which dimensions Unforgiving Void is active in.
If it contains *, it is a denylist. Otherwise, it is an allowlist.
